name: Hand of Midas - Envato Affiliate Money Generator Plugin
author: CodeRevolution

sections.description: This plugin will do the hard work for you in making a successful affiliate marketing profitable website.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0 Release Date 2017-01-30
  • First version released!
Version 1.1 Release Date 2017-02-01/strong>
  • Added 3d preview button to 3DOcean items that support it
  • Added manual 'Comment Import' button for every generated post
  • Added rule running timeout manual setting support
  • Minor fixes and enhancements
Version 1.2 Release Date 2017-02-03
  • Added multisite support
Version 1.3 Release Date 2017-02-04
  • Improved control panel GUI
Version 1.4 Release Date 2017-02-10
  • reworked rule settings interface -> now every rule has it's own advanced settings panel (big improvement!)
  • added post creation date meta data
  • improved keyword replacer -> now it can add links, replace keywords or both
  • ability to disable pingbacks/trackbacks for generated posts
  • ability to set post format for generated posts
  • ability to send rule running log in email
  • improved performance of post generator engine
  • minor fixes and enhancements
Version 1.5 Release Date 2017-02-11
  • Added the ability to search Envato Marketplaces and to import items based on search result!
Version 1.6 Release Date 2017-02-12
  • Google Translate support added - choose the language of the generated articles!
  • Text Spinner support added (automatically modify words in generated text with synonyms, great SEO value!) - 3 available options: 'The Best Spinner', 'WikiSynonyms' and 'FreeThesaurus'
Version 1.7 Release Date 2017-02-14
  • Title/Content length limitations added
  • Include/Exclude posts based on predefined keywords
